info.title: GoJetter API
info.description: API documentation for the GoJetter Laravel backend.

get.description: Returns a list of active activities filtered by search, category_id, type, and sorted by price if specified.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter results by type: private or group

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search keyword for activity title or description

get.description: Returns detailed information for a specific activity including category, images, dates, time slots, inclusions, exclusions, policies, expectations, and reviews.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The unique slug of the activity

post.summary: Submit a review for a activity

Message.example: Email not verified. OTP has been sent to your email.

post.summary: Resend email OTP to an existing user

422.description: Validation error (email required or not found)

post.summary: Verify email OTP for user account activation

200.description: OTP verified and email marked as verified

post.summary: Send OTP to email for password reset

post.description: Allows authenticated customers to update their profile information.
Permanently deletes the authenticated user's account.

get.description: Returns all blog categories that are not deleted
Returns all active blogs with related category data

title.example: Exploring the Hidden Gems of Northern Pakistan

short_description.example: Discover breathtaking valleys, lakes, and traditions nestled in Pakistan's northern regions.

get.description: Fetch a blog post along with its category by slug

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The slug of the blog post

title.example: Exploring the Hidden Gems of Northern Pakistan

get.description: Returns a list of bookings with tour and user details

post.summary: Create a new tour booking with details

get.description: Retrieve the list of cart items for the authenticated user

post.description: Stores a new cart item for the authenticated user.

activity_id.description: ID of the activity (must exist in activities table)

activity_date_id.description: ID of the activity date (must exist in activity_dates table)

activity_time_slot_id.description: ID of the activity time slot (must exist in activity_time_slots table)

get.description: Deletes the cart item with the given ID for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the cart record to delete

get.description: Returns a list of supported currencies with their code, symbol, rate, and default status.
Returns a list of all countries.

description.example: Terms and conditions for a tours website and mobile app should outline user responsibilities...
Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information...

answer.example: This is a tour website and applications.

post.description: Saves a contact form entry from a user.

get.description: Retrieve a list of cards saved by the authenticated customer.

post.description: Store a new card for the authenticated customer using a Stripe payment method.
Stores a customer request for a sub-service, including optional medical details and file upload.

get.summary: Get list of active social media links
Get list of active tour categories
get.description: Returns a list of active tour categories with thumbnail URLs

get.summary: Get list of active tours or activities
get.description: Returns a list of active tours or activities filtered by search, category_id, type, and sorted by price if specified.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter results by type: private or group

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search keyword for tour title or description

get.description: Returns a detailed tour object with associated data such as category, reviews, images, pricing, documents, FAQs, and more.

post.summary: Submit a review for a tour

post.description: Adds a tour to the authenticated user's wishlist.

tour_id.description: ID of the tour to be added to wishlist

post.description: Deletes a wishlist item for the authenticated user by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the wishlist item to delete

BearerToken.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Bearer {token}"
BearerToken.name: Authorization
